花輪第二中の思い出胸に　鹿角 来年３月閉校記念式典

04 Nov 2019, 20:00



校歌を斉唱する生徒ら（２日、鹿角市の花輪第二中で）

　少子化に伴い、鹿角市立花輪第二中学（生徒数６１人）が閉校することになり、記念式典が２日、同校で行われた。来年３月、花輪第一中学に統合され、花輪中学となる。
　花輪第二中学は、１９４７年に柴平中学として開校し、７２年に改称。卒業生５９６９人を数え、７３年の歴史を誇る。
　式典では、生徒らは和楽器の琴８面を演奏して来賓を迎え、児玉健司・ＰＴＡ会長が「私も卒業生で人生の深い関わり合いを学んだ。新中学で生徒の笑顔と活躍に期待する」と式辞を述べ、田中洋校長も「地域の皆さんは断腸の思いで閉校を決断した。心を一つに新しい学校を作ってくれる」と在校生に贈る言葉を述べた。
　生徒らは「五百の健児集い来る」と歌う校歌を斉唱。６３年には５１０人だった生徒数が激減した歴史を卒業生らに聞き取り、校舎や修学旅行、部活動にまつわる物語を大型スクリーンに映写して「未来へつなげ、二中魂！」と群読した。

The memory of Hanawa No. 2 for the memory chest

04 Nov 2019, 20:00



Students singing school songs (2nd day in Kanano City Wreath 2)

With the declining birthrate, Kazuno City Hanawa Second Junior High School (61 students) was closed, and a commemorative ceremony was held at the school on the 2nd. In March of next year, it will be integrated into Hanawa Daiichi Junior High School.
Hanawa Second Junior High School was opened in 1947 as Shibahira Junior High School and renamed in 1972. It has a history of 73 years with 5969 graduates.
At the ceremony, the students played 8 kotos of Japanese musical instruments and welcomed guests. Kenji Kodama and PTA President said, “I also learned a deep relationship with my life as a graduate. ”Said the president, Hiroshi Tanaka said,“ The local people have decided to close the school because of their incision. They will create a new school with their hearts together. ”
The students sang a school song singing “Gathering 500 Healthy Children”. Interviewed graduates about the history of a sharp decline in the number of students, which was 510 in 1963. The story about school buildings, school excursions and club activities was projected on a large screen and read as "Connect to the future, two middle souls!" .
